text: is a series of video games created by SNK then SNK Playmore. It is a series of 2D shoot 'em ups released on the Neo Geo platform. The series is known for its detailed 2D pixel-art and high difficulty. The games are about the Peregrine Falcon Squad, a small group of soldiers who fight against a rebel army, aliens, zombies, mummies and various other forces intent on world domination. == References == Category:Cooperative video games Category:Military science fiction video games Category:Video games about terrorism Category:Run and gun games Category:Video game series
title: Metal Slug (series)
